title: Authors and Citation
text: White RA, Berg-Hansen CV, Zhang C (2024). csstyle: Standardizing Outputs CSIDS Style. R package version 2024.9.25, https://github.com/csids/csstyle, https://www.csids./csstyle/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {csstyle: Standardizing Outputs in the CSIDS Style},   author = {Richard Aubrey White and Celine Victoria Berg-Hansen and Chi Zhang},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 2024.9.25, https://github.com/csids/csstyle},   url = {https://www.csids.no/csstyle/}, }

title: Standardizing Outputs in the CSIDS Style
text: csstyle system standardizing outputs (e.g. graphs, tables, reports). standard tools producing output flexible, allowing much variation making difficult produce consistent outputs. package focuses producing limited outputs consistently look . Read introduction vignette run help(package="csstyle").

title: Standardizing Outputs in the CSIDS Style
text: csverse set R packages developed help solve problems frequently occur performing disease surveillance. want install dev versions (access packages haven’t released CRAN), run usethis::edit_r_profile() edit .Rprofile. write : Save file restart R. can now install csverse packages drat repository.
code: options(   repos = structure(c(     CSVERSE = "https://www.csids.no/drat/",     CRAN    = "https://cran.rstudio.com"   )) ) install.packages("csstyle")
